Methodologies: Measurement of allergen specific IgE antibodies
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ImmunoCAP Allergen Components assay measuring allergen-specific IgE using automated fluorescence immunoassay on Phadia instruments
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro quantitative assay for measurement of allergen specific IgE in human serum or plasma (EDTA or Na-Heparin), aiding clinical diagnosis of IgE mediated allergic disorders in clinical laboratories using Phadia 100, 250, and 1000 instruments
